meanings: (훌륭한 광경) grandeur, grand[magnificent, splendid] sight[view], great spectacle

vlive.korean: 장관상 그건 어떻게 하면 받는 거예요? How can you win the prize? 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울여자상업고등학교 ep5.(홍현희X정세운X강율)
vlive.english: How can you win the prize?

vlive.korean: 역시 수학경시대회 올림피아드 - 장관상 출신! Korea mathematics olympiad. - A recipient of the minister's award! 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 (SJ returns) : [슈주 리턴즈 : 스핀오프] 특규 리턴즈 픽쿡크라운 EP01
vlive.english: Korea mathematics olympiad. - A recipient of the minister's award!

vlive.korean: [장관이네요 절경이고요] 어딜 봐서? 아 흰 벽? [Right, it's amazing and great] What is so luxurious? Oh, the white wall? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 우주에서 제일 호화로운 비쥬얼 파티🎉 장관이네요 절경이고요,,🤩✨ (Seonghwa&Yunho talking about behind episode)
vlive.english: [Right, it's amazing and great] What is so luxurious? Oh, the white wall?

vlive.korean: [장관이네요... 절경이고요] 폭포가 나와요? [It's a magnificent sight... splendid too] Can you see the falls? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.69
vlive.english: [It's a magnificent sight... splendid too] Can you see the falls?

vlive.korean: 장관이? - 네 장관이. The view? - Yes, the view. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] A.C.E's SUMMER VACATION WEEK - 에이스 X 여름방학 스페셜위크

examples.korean: Only two ministers dissented from the official view. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오직 두 명의 장관만이 그 공식 견해에 반대했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Only two ministers dissented from the official view. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ministers must be made answerable for their decisions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 장관들이 자신의 결정에 대해 책임을 지게 해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ministers must be made answerable for their decisions. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The minister was praised for his acute political antennae. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 장관은 정치적 촉각이 아주 예민하다는 찬사를 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The minister was praised for his acute political antennae. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ministers should be more attentive to the needs of families. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 장관들은 가족들이 필요로 하는 것에 더 신경을 써야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
